labels.name: Filter name
labels.name_: How will you call this filter?

subscription-delete.title: Delete confirmation
subscription-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete selected subscriptions?
subscription-delete.warning: WARNING: This change is permanent and cannot be undone. It may cause data loss

subscription-save.title: Save changes
subscription-save.message: The subscription has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

schedule-delete.title: Delete confirmation
schedule-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this order schedule?

schedule-save.title: Save changes
schedule-save.message: The schedule has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

new-order.title: Confirmation
new-order.message: Create a new order for this subscription?

Subscription.EnableSubscriptions.title: Subscriptions activation
Subscription.EnableSubscriptions.description: Enable/ disable subscriptions for your store

Subscription.Status.title: Subscription statuses
Subscription.Status.description: Manage subscription statuses by clicking on a pencil icon

Subscription.SubscriptionNewNumberTempla.title: Subscription number template
Subscription.SubscriptionNewNumberTempla.description: Configure template to generate new subscription number. Parameters: 0 - date (the UTC time of number generation); 1 - the sequence number

Subscription.EnableSubscriptionOrdersCre.title: Subscription order creation activation
Subscription.EnableSubscriptionOrdersCre.description: Enable/ disabe automatic order creation for subscriptions

Subscription.CronExpression.title: Cron expression for scheduling subscription processing job
Subscription.CronExpression.description:
Define a cron expression to schedule subscription processing tasks.
Examples:
- Run every X minutes: "0/x * * * *"
- Run every X hours at 00 minutes: "0 */X * * *"
- Specify minutes: "15 */x * * *"
- Run every X days at midnight: "0 0 */x * *"

Subscription.CronExpressionOrdersJob.title: Cron expression for scheduling subscription order creation job
Subscription.CronExpressionOrdersJob.description:
Define a cron expression to schedule subscription order creation tasks.
Examples:
- Run every X minutes: "0/x * * * *"
- Run every X hours at 00 minutes: "0 */X * * *"
- Specify minutes: "15 */x * * *"
- Run every X days at midnight: "0 0 */x * *"

Subscription.PastDue.Delay.title: Past due delay in days
Subscription.PastDue.Delay.description: Specify the number of days after which unpaid subscriptions become 'Past due'

Subscription.ExportImport.Description.title: Export/Import description
Subscription.ExportImport.Description.description: Provide description of the module for the platform export/import wizard

NewSubscriptionEmailNotification.description: This notification is emailed to client when new subscription is created

SubscriptionCanceledEmailNotification.description: This notification is emailed to client when subscription is canceled
